name: GKFriendRequestComposeViewControllerDelegate
desc: The GKFriendRequestComposeViewControllerDelegate protocol is implemented by delegates of the GKFriendRequestComposeViewController class. The delegate is called when the player dismisses the friend request.

items.name: func friendRequestComposeViewControllerDidFinish(GKFriendRequestComposeViewController)
items.desc: Called when the player dismisses the request.
